summary: Completed comprehensive testing of the Equity Trust Portfolio platform. All backend APIs are fully functional (23/23 tests passed), and frontend UI components are working correctly with proper integration. The platform successfully delivers all requested features including educational content, AI assistant, templates, and authentication flows.

AI Assistant chat endpoint responds with grounded GPT-4o responses

Portfolio CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Trust profile creation and management
Asset creation and management
Notice creation and management
Document creation with template support
